scripts.start: pm2 flush && pm2 start index.js --name eos --node-args="-r esm -r dotenv/config" && pm2 logs eos
scripts.stop: pm2 stop eos && pm2 delete eos && pm2 kill
scripts.restart: yarn stop && pm2 flush && yarn start
scripts.release:git: github-release release --user uniibu --repo eos --tag v1.0.8 --name "v1.0.8" --description "eos wallet release"
scripts.release:upload: github-release upload --user uniibu  --repo eos --tag v1.0.8 --name "bitsler_eos.sh" --file bitsler_eos.sh
